scripts.redeploy: npm run remove:dev && npm run create:dev && npm run deploy:dev
scripts.deploy:dev: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 fuseio/fuse-dev subgraph.dev.yaml
scripts.deploy:qa: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 fuseio/fuse-qa subgraph.qa.yaml
scripts.deploy:prod: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 fuseio/fuse subgraph.yaml
